title: State Bank of India forms a team of 2,000 bankers to attract the rich clients
description: State Bank of India, the largest lender in the country, made a renewed push into wealth management. By deploying 2,000 executives as relationship managers and focusing on smaller companies, SBI aimed to capture a share of the growing wealth. The bank also reported a slight profit increase for the quarter, exceeding market expectations.
